types.html:
égérie f (plural égéries)

  1. muse, a woman who is a source of inspiration
  2. a person, usually a woman, who is the public face or representative of some campaign or movement
trans: muse, a woman who is a source of inspiration
a person, usually a woman, who is the public face or representative of some campaign or movement

title: égérie
pronunHtml:
• IPA(key): /e.ʒe.ʁi/
  • Homophone: égéries
  • Hyphenation: é‧gé‧rie
